product_name: Pearl Izumi Quest SL Bike Jersey - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The men's Pearl Izumi Quest SL Bike Jersey is soft, lightweight and quick drying-just what you need on long training rides. This sleeveless version gives you the ultimate in ventilation. SELECT Transfer fabric provides cool comfort by quickly wicking away perspiration, and it also offers excellent stretch for freedom of movement. Fabric provides UPF 40 sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Generous 13.5 in. front zipper lets you control the ventilation. 3 rear pockets store cycling essentials and food. The men's Pearl Izumi Quest SL Bike Jersey has reflective hits to increase visibility in low light. Closeout.
short_description: The men's Pearl Izumi Quest SL Bike Jersey is soft, lightweight and quick drying-just what you need on long training rides. This sleeveless version gives you the ultimate in ventilation.
